content.text: Hi there! I'm [participant_1]. What's your name?
Hi! I'm [participant_2]. Nice to meet you!
You too! What do you do for fun?
I love to read, watch movies, and cuddle up with my dog.
That sounds fun! I love reading too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love The Hunger Games series, Harry Potter series, and The Lord of the Rings series.
I've read all of those! They're all great books.
I know, right? I love them all. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies too. I'm a big fan of science fiction and fantasy movies.
Me too! I love Star Wars, Star Trek, and Marvel movies.
Those are all great movies! I'm a big fan of all three of those franchises.
Me too! I love the action, the adventure, and the special effects.
Me too! I love how they can take you to other worlds and tell such amazing stories.
Me too! They're some of my favorite movies.
Me too! Do you watch any TV shows?
I watch a few. I like The Walking Dead, The Flash, and Game of Thrones.
Those are all great shows! I'm a big fan of The Walking Dead and Game of Thrones.
Me too! They're both so well-made and have such great stories.
Me too! I can't wait for the next season of Game of Thrones.
Me neither! It's going to be awesome!
I know! I'm so excited!
